definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
Haojiang district of Shantou city 汕头市, Guangdong

sentences.english: The company already owns the City of Dreams gaming resort in Macau.
sentences.chinese: 公司已经拥有了澳门的新濠天地娱乐场。

sentences.english: I know it on the bridge over Hao River.
sentences.chinese: 我是在濠河的桥上知道的。

sentences.english: Haohe River is one of the four city moats well reserved presently in China.
sentences.chinese: 濠河为我国目前保存最好的四条护城河之一。

definition: to deepen (e.g. a ditch)/to extract/to manage/ladle (old)
clear/vast and deep/classifier for a body of clear water
to ascend/to rise to the rank of/to promote/to hoist/liter/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth dou 斗[dou3]
variant of 升[sheng1]/to ascend/to rise in rank
